resources.string: Please make sure that Internet is available, to use the app. Please connect to internet (either through Wifi or Mobile data), to continue using the app.

"Sri Shankara Nama Japa Yagna" is the ardent desire of Shri Binddu Madhava Avadhootha Sadguru of Shree kshetra, Belaguru, to perform a Shathakoti Shree Shankara Nama Japa Yagna as per the mandate of parama pujya "Shri Shri Shri Bharathi Teertha Mahaswamiji" and "Shri Shri Shri Vidhushekara Bharathi Teertha Mahaswamiji" at a time when society around us is disintegrating as a result of unbridled collapse of all values, social, culturual, political and moral. 

 Hence we humbly request everyone (irrespecitve of caste, creed, gender, age, and so on) to participate in this sacred japa yagna by chanting SRI SHANKARACHARYA SADGURAVE NAMAHA daily and make it a grand success. 

 We request everyone, to notify your count to us, through UPDATE COUNT section or bottom-right button, given in the app. Please provide your personal details (once) using MY DETAILS section and keep visiting the CHECK WEBSITE section for continuous updates.
